document.full_text: adm. mike mullen, the chairman of the joint chiefs of staff, said there were 'irrevocable logistics and operational decisions' to be made before the withdrawal of forces was scheduled to accelerate.
document.title: iraq must decide within weeks if u.s. troops will stay past 2011, top official says
lines_and_colors: adm. mike mullen, the chairman of the joint chiefs of staff, said there were 'irrevocable logistics and operational decisions' to be made before the withdrawal of forces was scheduled to accelerate.
